subject: Basketball
lead_paragraph: Steve Nash, who make six free throws in the final 16.9 seconds, had 26 points and 11 assists as the Suns beat the struggling Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
snippet: Steve Nash, who make six free throws in the final 16.9 seconds, had 26 points and 11 assists as the Suns beat the struggling Knicks at Madison Square Garden.
